caption.center: Ronald McCULLOUGH and Ronnie W. McCullough v. Ronald J. ARTIGUES.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Chancery Court, Hancock County; Wm. L. Stewart, Chancellor.
opinion.attorneys:
L. Kenneth Krogstad, Holleman Krogstad, William P. Wessler, Gulfport, for appellant.
John A. Scafide, Jr., Fabre, Genin Scafide, Bay St. Louis, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before ROBERTSON, P.J., and BROOM and HAWKINS, JJ.
